mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_no, m_id, p_no, cart_color, cart_size, amount_count, cart_price, cart_sale_price) values (cart_no_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{p_no}, #{cart_color}, #{cart_size}, #{amount_count}, #{cart_price}, #{cart_sale_price})
mapper.select: select count(p_no) from cart where m_id=#{m_id} and p_no=#{p_no} and cart_color=#{cart_color} and cart_size=#{cart_size}
mapper.update: update cart set amount_count = amount_count + #{amount_count}, cart_price = cart_price + #{cart_price}, cart_sale_price = cart_sale_price + #{cart_sale_price} where m_id=#{m_id} and p_no=#{p_no} and cart_color=#{cart_color} and cart_size=#{cart_size}
mapper.select: select c.p_no, c.cart_color, c.cart_size, c.amount_count, c.cart_price, c.cart_sale_price, p.p_name, p.p_before_price, p.p_price, p.p_img1, p.p_class, p.p_category from cart c left outer join product_list p on c.p_no = p.p_no where m_id = #{m_id}
